interfaces

Class DriverInterface

  • java.lang.Object
    • interfaces.DriverInterface
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Driver

    public abstract class DriverInterface
extends java.lang.Object
    Public Interface to use Simulation Driver.
    Author:
    Borja Zarco

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static DriverInterface instance
      Singleton instance of Driver, accessed by getInstance().

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      protected DriverInterface()
      Suppresses default constructor, ensuring non-instantiability.

    • Method Detail

      • init

        private void init()

      • getInstance

        public static DriverInterface getInstance()
        Static method to access singleton instance of Driver.
        Returns:
        instance of Driver.

      • setPrintTrace

        public abstract void setPrintTrace(boolean printTrace)
        Sets boolean to print live movements of Vehicles.
        Parameters:
        printTrace - true or false

      • isPrintingTrace

        public abstract boolean isPrintingTrace()
        Checks if live movements of Vehicles are being printed.
        Returns:
        true if trace is printing.

      • getRNG

        public abstract RandomNumberGenerator getRNG()
        Get main Random Number Generator.
        Returns:
        instance of the Random Number Generator used in Simulation.

      • repaintGraphics

        public abstract void repaintGraphics()
        Refresh graphic representation.

      • parse

        public abstract void parse(java.lang.String roadNetworkFile,
         java.lang.String routesFile)
        Parse Simulation input files.
        Parameters:
        roadNetworkFile - Path to a csv file with road network data.
        routesFile - Path to a text file with data on parkings, destinations, and routes.

      • startGraphics

        public abstract void startGraphics(boolean graphicsLive)
        Starts Graphical Representation of Simulation and shows it in a Window.
        Parameters:
        graphicsLive - true or false

      • isGraphicsLive

        public abstract boolean isGraphicsLive()
        Check if Graphics are updated live.
        Returns:
        true if Graphics are updated live.

      • getQueue

        public abstract PriorityQueue getQueue()
        Get main Priority Queue.
        Returns:
        priority queue used in simulation

      • runSimmulation

        public abstract void runSimmulation()
        Call when everything is ready to run simulation. Need to call after startIntersections().

      • getNEventsRun

        public abstract int getNEventsRun()
        Get the number of Events dequeued and run during Simulation.
        Returns:
        number of Events run during Simulation.

      • addRoad

        public abstract void addRoad(Road road)
        Add Road to global list.
        Parameters:
        road - road to add

        public abstract Road getRoad(int i)
        Get Road with ID i from global list.
        Parameters:
        i - ID of road to return
        Returns:
        road with ID i

      • isRoadDefined

        public abstract int isRoadDefined(IntersectionInterface IS1,
                IntersectionInterface IS2)
        Check if Road with bounding Intersections IS1 and IS2 is already defined.
        Parameters:
        IS1 - bounding Intersection 1
        IS2 - bounding Intersection 2
        Returns:
        true if it is already defined

      • getPath

        public abstract Path getPath(Parking parking,
           IntersectionInterface destination)
        Get Path defined by starting Parking and ending Destination.
        Parameters:
        parking - starting parking of Path
        destination - ending intersection of Path
        Returns:
        path with given constraints (parking-destination)

      • hasPath

        public abstract boolean hasPath(Parking parking)
        Check if parking has at least one Path defined.
        Parameters:
        parking - parking to check
        Returns:
        true if parking has one or more Paths assigned
